subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Evgeni Malkin had a goal and two assists and the visiting Penguins won their third in a row without Crosby, 4-1 over the stumbling Dallas Stars.
snippet: Evgeni Malkin had a goal and two assists and the visiting Penguins won their third in a row without Crosby, 4-1 over the stumbling Dallas Stars.
